description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome in COLOR 2 !!  Increase your dexterity to next level for play 5 different game mode in  arcade or survival. Challenge yourself by collecting  the 66 medals and improve your 290 statistics!
